### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
 -  Ensure that burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before use.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
 -  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before use.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
 -  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before use.
### Errors when using electricity groups without plug-in
 -  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before use.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
 -  Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before use.
### Errors when using belt groups without items
 -  Ensure that belt groups have items to transport before use.


### NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
- entity_data (list): A list of entity data, including position and status.
- entity_status (dict): A dictionary mapping entity statuses to their corresponding values.
*Utility functions:*
- get_entity_data(): A function to retrieve entity data from the game state.
- get_entity_status(): A function to retrieve the status of an entity.
- connect_steam_engine(): A function to connect a steam engine to the power grid.
- plug_in_electricity_group(): A function to plug in an electricity group to the electric network.
*Failure modes:*
- get_entity_data() may fail if the entity data is stale or unavailable.
- connect_steam_engine() may fail if the steam engine is not properly connected.
- plug_in_electricity_group() may fail if the electricity group is not properly plugged in.
*Success modes:*
- get_entity_data() returns the entity data successfully.
- connect_steam_engine() connects the steam engine to the power grid successfully.
- plug_in_electricity_group() plugs in the electricity group to the electric network successfully.
